root.name: Sherlock Holmes vs. Jack the Ripper
root.description: Sherlock Holmes vs. Jack the Ripper is a 3D point-and-click adventure which has you playing the worlds' most famous detective and his faithful assistant Dr Watson as they track down histories most notorious serial killer Jack the Ripper and try to bring him to justice. The game is based upon authentic facts and materials from the original case and takes place in a faithfully recreated 1880's London city.
